column4: for some reason, I leave my computer on (connected to a TV) and then after I leave and come back, I can't get the TV to show the computer... I can ssh into and it is on, just can't see it's display on the TV... any ideas?
have you tried to shut off and back on the tv
I have tried unplugging and replugging, turning the tv on and off
almoxarife is right follow is advice :)
